New data reveals benefit to schools across the country under Gillard Govt’s #BetterSchools Plan: http://t.co/AW1pPahZWP TeamJG
Current Howard-era school funding model is broken-if no change, federal school funding will go backwards by $16.2b over next 6yrs.TeamJG
If the #BetterSchools plan does not proceed, every school, in every state and territory and in every sector, will be worse off. TeamJG
The #BetterSchools Plan means on average around $2.2 million extra for every school in QLD. TeamJG
The #BetterSchools Plan means on average around $300,000 extra for every school in WA. TeamJG
The #BetterSchools Plan means on average around $1.6 million extra for every school in NSW, Tasmania, and the NT. TeamJG
The #BetterSchools Plan means on average around $800,000 extra for every school in SA and the ACT. TeamJG
The #BetterSchools Plan means on average around $1.8 million extra for every school in Victoria. TeamJG
#BetterSchools funding will help pay for literacy & numeracy coaches,staff training,homework clubs & support for students who need it.TeamJG
The #BetterSchools plan will help make sure that every student, in every school, is getting a great education. TeamJG
So great walking around the lake with Reuben and the other thousands of dogs today – a great cause! @RSPCA #MillionPaws #mpwcanberra JG
If the National Plan for School Improvement does not proceed, every school will suffer – we can’t let that happen. #BetterSchools JG

Leaving Victor Jara shelter where, together with minister @lavinjoaquin, we visit our compatriots who are looking for shelter there for sleeping on the street
Through a network of more than 40 hostels, these Chileans and Chileans receive love, food, bed and medical attention.
We still have about 12 thousand compatriots in street situations. For them it is this Noche Digna program.

Jumapili Mei 19 mwaka huu tulimpoteza mzee Ally Kleist Sykes akiwa anapatiwa matibabu Jijini Nairobi. (1/4)
Mzee Sykes alikuwa moja ya watu muhimu kabisa katika kupigania uhuru na haki yetu kujitawala. Mchango wake ni mkubwa na usiopimika. (2/4)
Alikuwa ni mmoja ya wazalendo 17 walioanzisha chama cha TANU, mwenye kadi namba 2 ya chama, baada ya namba 1 ya Mwalimu Nyerere. (3/4)
Moyo wake wa ujasiri & kujitoa kupigania uhuru wa nchi yetu & utu wa watu wake ubaki kama mfano wa kuigwa kwa kizazi chetu na vijavyo. (4/4)

Speaking at the press conference after the #euco on the #energy and #tax, #fraud and #taxevasion
I welcome support for our NO REGRETS scenario, with action in five areas #euco #energy
One: complete the internal energy market #euco #energy
Two: invest in innovation and infrastructure #euco #energy
Read also our toolbox to fight against #TaxFraud and #TaxEvasion http://t.co/RiLOJQh0bl
Three: commit to greater #energy efficiency #euco
Four: exploit renewable sources more cheaply. #euco #energy
Five: diversify supplies. #euco #energy
There is much we can do if we act together through Europe #euco #energy
I’m pleased that some decisions have been taken today on #tax evasion and #fraud, including reference on automatic information exchange#euco
We still need to go further. Citizens have high expectations. #euco  #tax
It is important that public opinion keeps these commitments under close scrutiny.  #euco #tax
after #EUCO: 'Steps to come to automatic exchange of tax data & approach VAT fraud.' Video: http://t.co/DspkrAZyZt
